#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long t,count,count2;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		count2=0;
		unsigned long long int n,m;
		scanf("%llu %llu",&n,&m);
		while(n>1)
		{
		n=n/2;
		count++;	
		}
		while(m>1)
		{
			m=m/2;
			count2++;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",max(count,count2));
	}
	return 0;
}
